text: WNUW-LP (98.5 FM) is a radio station licensed to serve the community of Aston, Pennsylvania. The station is owned by Neumann University. It airs a variety radio format. The station was assigned the call sign WRNU-LP by the Federal Communications Commission on February 18, 2014. On June 24, 2014, the station changed its call sign to WNUW-LP ==References== ==External links== * Official Website * NUW-LP NUW-LP Category:Radio stations established in 2015 Category:2015 establishments in Pennsylvania NUW-LP Category:Variety radio stations in the United States Category:Delaware County, Pennsylvania
title: WNUW-LP
